alert.note: Alert for Erie (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 6:49AM EST until February 20 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR AN ICE JAM NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...An ice jam is disrupting flow on the Huron River. Flooding is expected today as additional rainfall causes the jam to break up and river levels to rise. * WHERE...Along the Huron River north of Milan in Erie County Ohio. * WHEN...Until noon EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 642 AM EST, gauge reports an ice jam along the Huron River between Milan and Franklin Flats. Flooding is likely today. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Franklin Flats Low lying areas near Huron. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
